column5: For you diehard US walleye fisherman, it looks like there is a loophole in the border crossing ruling that will let you come to Canada. Read half way down on this CBC border article and you will find the answer https://www.cbc.ca/news/business/can...aska-1.5670867
If only I had known 33 years ago , that this might have been the eventuality of our fishing world, I might have waited to get married.... PjShorthorn
Leaves me hanging high n dry,I'm out
Well, I wish I could carry over an extra week of vacation for 2021 but guess 2020 is <1% of a chance.
After reading I had to take a high blood pressure pill to calm me down
Rich it's not looking good at all,I don't think we are going on a press lake adventure,lucky for the fish cause they were going to get throttled
One person in a boat in the middle of know where is a great idea

My brother has a brother-in-law that did just that many years ago n she went home without him. They wouldn't let him in on some grounds even though he was married to her in the states.Wasn't the most savory character around. Later, Jay
